page.title: 10Family Life on Sunday
page.content:
{Our Sunday.
We usually wake up a little later on Sunday between 8.00 and 8.30. Then we have breakfast.{Mother and Daughter} get ready for Sunday School and Church. When it is Family Service we all go.{Father}gardens,{Brother finishes off homework. For lunch, mother and daughter cook chicken, pork, or different kinds of meat, or have a barbecue. Relax in the afternoon or play games or watch T.V. We sometimes go out for a ride in the car. Then we have tea buns, cakes etc. Have a walk, then home to bed.
